title: gopherbot: fails to mention some CLs on their issues
body:
Gopherbot never commented about https://golang.org/cl/18623/ or https://golang.org/cl/18860/ on their respective issues.

@bradfitz conjectured that it could be due to the trailing period in the "Fixes #NNNN." commit message line, but https://golang.org/cl/18911/ uses the same syntax and was mentioned by gopherbot.

I suspect it has to do with me immediately commenting "R=go1.7" on both CLs.

/cc @rsc
